Climate Change: Scientific Evidence and Facts

At-a-Glance: Key Climate Facts

  • Global temperature has risen 1.1°C since 1880
  • CO2 levels are at 420 ppm, highest in 3 million years
  • Arctic ice is declining at 13% per decade
  • Sea levels rising 3.3mm per year
